data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The first-half is over at Pride Park Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
QPR make their first substitution with Dominic Ball replacing Albert Adomah.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a second substitution, with Macauley Bonne replacing Lyndon Dykes.
In the minute 65, Bright Osayi-Samuel, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Chris Willock is the substitute for QPR.
Duane Holmes is replacing Jason Knight for the home team.
Kazim is replacing Martyn Waghorn for Derby County at Pride Park Stadium.
In the minute 81, The home team have replaced Wayne Rooney with Louie Sibley. This is the third substitution made today by Phillip Cocu.
Goal! QPR take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Macauley Bonne.
Great play from Rob Dickie to set up the goal.
Kazim (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
